member.name: M:System.Numerics.HashCodeHelper.CombineHashCodes(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Combines two hash codes, useful for combining hash codes of individual vector elements

member.name: T:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2
member.summary: A structure encapsulating a 3x2 matrix.

member.summary: The first element of the first row

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.M12
member.summary: The second element of the first row

member.summary: The first element of the second row

member.summary: The second element of the second row

member.summary: The first element of the third row

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.M32
member.summary: The second element of the third row

member.name: P:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.Identity
member.summary: Returns the multiplicative identity matrix.

member.name: P:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.IsIdentity
member.summary: Returns whether the matrix is the identity matrix.

member.name: P:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.Translation
member.summary: Gets or sets the translation component of this matrix.

member.summary: Constructs a Matrix3x2 from the given components.

member.summary: Creates a translation matrix from the given vector.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.CreateTranslation(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a translation matrix from the given X and Y components.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.CreateScale(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a scale matrix from the given X and Y components.
member.param: Value to scale by on the X-axis.
Value to scale by on the Y-axis.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.CreateScale(System.Double,System.Double,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Creates a scale matrix that is offset by a given center point.
member.param: Value to scale by on the X-axis.
Value to scale by on the Y-axis.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.CreateScale(System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Creates a scale matrix from the given vector scale.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.CreateScale(System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Creates a scale matrix from the given vector scale with an offset from the given center point.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.CreateScale(System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a scale matrix that scales uniformly with the given scale.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.CreateScale(System.Double,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Creates a scale matrix that scales uniformly with the given scale with an offset from the given center.

member.summary: Creates a skew matrix from the given angles in radians.

member.summary: Creates a skew matrix from the given angles in radians and a center point.

member.summary: Creates a rotation matrix using the given rotation in radians.

member.summary: Creates a rotation matrix using the given rotation in radians and a center point.
member.param: The amount of rotation, in radians.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.GetDeterminant
member.summary: Calculates the determinant for this matrix. The determinant is calculated by expanding the matrix with a third column whose values are (0,0,1).

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.Invert(System.Numerics.Matrix3x2,System.Numerics.Matrix3x2@)
member.summary: Attempts to invert the given matrix. If the operation succeeds, the inverted matrix is stored in the result parameter.
member.returns: True if the operation succeeded, False otherwise.

member.summary: Linearly interpolates from matrix1 to matrix2, based on the third parameter.

member.summary: Negates the given matrix by multiplying all values by -1.

member.name: T:System.Numerics.Quaternion
member.summary: A structure encapsulating a four-dimensional vector (x,y,z,w), which is used to efficiently rotate an object about the (x,y,z) vector by the angle theta, where w = cos(theta/2).

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.X
member.summary: Specifies the X-value of the vector component of the Quaternion.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Y
member.summary: Specifies the Y-value of the vector component of the Quaternion.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Z
member.summary: Specifies the Z-value of the vector component of the Quaternion.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.W
member.summary: Specifies the rotation component of the Quaternion.

member.name: P:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Identity
member.summary: Returns a Quaternion representing no rotation.

member.name: P:System.Numerics.Quaternion.IsIdentity
member.summary: Returns whether the Quaternion is the identity Quaternion.

The rotation part of the Quaternion.

member.summary: Divides each component of the Quaternion by the length of the Quaternion.

member.summary: Creates a Quaternion from a vector and an angle to rotate about the vector.

The roll angle, in radians, around the Z-axis.
